quotes.quoteText: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quoteText: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quoteText: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quoteText: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quoteText: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quoteText: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quoteText: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quoteText: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quoteText: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quoteText: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quoteText: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quoteText: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quoteText: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quoteText: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quoteText: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quoteText: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quoteText: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quoteText: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quoteText: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quoteText: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quoteText: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quoteText: If you want to achieve greatness, stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quoteText: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quoteText: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quoteText: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quoteText: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quoteText: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
